argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tmsbas.k | |- K = ( toMetSp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | tmstopn.j | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. } = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. } |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_tmslem | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( X = ( Base ` K ) /\ D = ( dist ` K ) /\ ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simp3d | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
